keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

lead_paragraph: At the Saturday farmer’s market in City Heights, a major portal for refugees, Khadija Musame, a Somali, arranges her freshly picked pumpkin leaves and lablab beans amid a United Nations of produce, including water spinach grown by a Cambodian refugee and amaranth, a grain harvested by Sarah Salie, who fled rebels in Liberia.

headline.main: A Farmer’s Market With the Tastes of Home
